name: Sysdig
description: Scan images with Sysdig Secure as part of your development pipeline.
author: Sysdig

inputs.name: sysdigurl
inputs.label: Sysdig Sysdig Secure SaaS Reion.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sysdig Secure Region. Default to Sysdig Secure US East (https://secure.sysdig.com)

inputs.name: apikey
inputs.label: Sysdig Secure API Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sysdig Secure API token for authentication.

inputs.name: failBuild
inputs.label: Fail the build on policy evaulation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fail the build if policy evaluation returns a fail.

inputs.name: skipTLS
inputs.label: Skip TLS verification
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skip TLS verification when calling Sysdig endpoints.

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.label: Verbose logging output
inputs.helpMarkDown: More verbose logging output from the Sysdig Inline Scanner.

inputs.name: privileged
inputs.label: Enable User Root and Privileged Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: Docker options maybe required depending on the access permissions for /var/run/docker.sock

inputs.name: internalRegistry
inputs.label: Sysdig Inline Scanning Image (registry/repo/image:tag)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pull Sysdig Inline Scanning image from custom registry. Supported image must be used (quay.io/sysdig/secure-inline-scan)
